heading: king's ransom
subheading: horror writer stephen king was in serious but stable condition after surgery early sunday for injuries sustained when he was hit by a minivan while walking near his home in maine. king sufered a collapsed lung, a broken leg and hip, and lacerations. but hospital officials said the novelist was feeling well enough after the surgery to joke with the staff and to inquire about his favorite baseball team, the boston red sox.
author: wired staff
